title: 📘 Introduction to Microsoft Word
description: Microsoft Word is a powerful word processing application essential for creating professional documents. In this lesson, you'll learn the fundamentals of Word and discover how to create, format, and manage documents effectively.

sections.title: Overview
sections.markdown: Microsoft Word is a powerful word processing application essential for creating professional documents. In this lesson, you'll learn the fundamentals of Word and discover how to create, format, and manage documents effectively.

subsections.title: ✅ Opening Word
subsections.markdown: There are several ways to open Microsoft Word depending on your setup and preferences.

image.alt: Word start screen – Blank Document highlighted

items: **From Start Menu**: Click the **Start** button and search for **Word**
**From Office.com**: Visit [office.com](https://office.com) and launch Word Online

subsections.title: 🖥️ Understanding the Interface
subsections.markdown: Familiarize yourself with the main components of the Word interface to work efficiently.

image.alt: Main interface with Ribbon and key elements

rows: Tabs with commands organized by function
Customizable toolbar for frequently used commands
Main workspace for typing and editing
Displays document info and zoom controls

subsections.title: Typing and Editing
subsections.markdown: Learn the fundamental text editing operations in Word.

image.alt: Example: Selecting and formatting text – Step 1

codeBlock.content:
• Type text by clicking and typing
• Use Backspace to delete characters
• Use Delete to remove characters ahead
• Double-click to select a word
• Triple-click to select a paragraph

image.alt: Font dialog box for text formatting options

tip.content: Use formatting consistently for a professional look.

subsections.title: Paragraph Formatting
subsections.markdown: Control how your paragraphs are aligned and spaced.

subsections.title: Lists & Bullets
subsections.markdown: Create organized lists to structure your content effectively.

image.alt: Bulleted and numbered lists in Ribbon

sections.title: Best Practices
sections.markdown: Follow these guidelines to create professional-looking documents.

exercise.title: Create Your First Document
exercise.description: Practice your new Word skills by creating a simple meeting agenda document.
steps: Open Word and create a **new blank document**
Add a **title** and format as Heading 1
